ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
633 A.2d 688
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Rodney L. MORDAN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued and Decided Oct. 19, 1993.
Stephen S. Pennington, Philadelphia, for R. Mordan.

Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
